text: if you want to edit your photos or add
special effects like filters try
aviaries photo editor it has a
straightforward interface and powerful
effects like the ability to adjust
contrast or blurring the apps interface
has been improved to align with iOS 7's
clean simple look a few improvements
have made it easier to use such as
putting special filters photo frames and
customizable stickers in one location
the new supply shop for a neat and
unusual way to read the news try out
Flipboard this app aggregates news items
from different sources into one place it
presents items in a graphics heavy
display which you control through finger
swipes to flip the screen to the next
article you can explore news items more
deeply by tapping on them and share what
you've discovered over email or perhaps
Twitter it's been updated to look at
home on iOS 7 including subtle
animations of the images when you tilt
your iphone to show off geolocation and
processing powers of your phone try out
night sky to the app is an augmented
reality guide to the heavens it will
show you an image of the stars and
planets above your head along with data
on each one as you hold your phone up to
the sky fun educational and very
futuristic
